'''"Night of the Party Pumpkins"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Night of the Party Pumpkins" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Birch Wood = 4
|Fabric = 4
|Yellow Dye = 4
|sort = Birch Wood;Fabric;Yellow Dye
}}

==Trivia==
*The "certain member of the Knights of Favonius" mentioned in the description is [[Lisa]], who suffers from cucurbitophobia.<ref>{{Ref/VO|Lisa|Least Favorite Food}}</ref>
